## marginBlock variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Should be replaced with `margin-block`<!-- -->.
> 

Equivalent to the [margin-block](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/margin-block) CSS property.

**Signature:**

